name: Gang Clash
description:
Gang Clash is a great strategy game! You will become a strategist and lead an army. Every time you win the fight, your mission is completed.

HOW TO PLAY:
• Use your great brain to arrange your army, you can merge your troops to get stronger.
• Buy new troops using rewarded coins.
• Tap “Fight” when your army is ready and choose good time to destroy all opponents.
• Be skillful to complete all increasingly difficult levels.

FEATURES:
• One finger control.
• Multiple unique levels.

• FREE & EASY TO PLAY.
• NO penalties & time limits; you can enjoy Gang Clash at your own pace!

STUNNING GRAPHICS:
• Catchy sound effects with mesmerizing visuals suitable for everyone

NEED HELP? HAVE ANY QUESTIONS?
• Support email: support@iecglobal.com.au
